error.regex: Module not installed|Module source has changed|terraform init

verdict.summary: Module source not downloaded. Need terraform init to download modules.

dead_ends.why_fails: Terraform manages .terraform/ â€” manual changes will be overwritten

dead_ends.action: Change module source to a local path
dead_ends.why_fails: Defeats the purpose of using versioned modules

workarounds.action: Run terraform init to download modules
workarounds.how: Run terraform init to download modules

workarounds.action: If module source changed, run terraform init -upgrade to fetch new version
workarounds.how: If module source changed, run terraform init -upgrade to fetch new version

workarounds.action: For CI/CD, ensure terraform init runs before plan/apply
workarounds.how:
# In CI/CD pipeline (e.g., GitHub Actions):
steps:
  - run: terraform init
  - run: terraform plan -out=tfplan
  - run: terraform apply tfplan

# Always run 'init' before 'plan' or 'apply'
# Cache .terraform directory for faster CI runs

frequently_confused_with.distinction: 'Error' is a module_error error while 'Error' has a different failure mode despite similar symptoms. Check error message details to differentiate.
